descriptionHtml:
More color details on Greatsword-textures. Including Iron, steel, ancient, dwarven and ebony.
Just some subtle changes to 5 greatsword textures I used.


===INSTALLATION===
Extract the folder into your Skyrim directory. 
normaly: (C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\)


===UNINSTALL===
To uninstall, Go to 
C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\textures\\weapons and delete the 
draugr, dwarven, ebony, iron and steel folder. (if you installed more textures for other weapons be sure to delete only the \"...greatsword.dds\" files only in that folders)

Have fun
author: feuerkorn
